alternativeNames: De Laet, Franz; De Laet, Frans; De Laet, Franz von
comments: Contich is his place of birth.
examples: Phyllocactus belgica Laet-Cont., Wiener Ill. Gart.-Zeitung 1904: 409. 1904
source: Misc. Corr.; Dates and Variant forenames from: Lotte Burkhardt (B). Monatsschr. Kakteenk. 28: 102 (1918). Eggli & Newton's Etymological Dictionary of Succulent Plant Names.
